name: Openspeedtest
longDescription:
SpeedTest by OpenSpeedTestâ„¢ is a Free and Open-Source HTML5 Network Performance Estimation Tool Written in Vanilla Javascript and only uses built-in Web APIs like XMLHttpRequest (XHR), HTML, CSS, JS, & SVG. No Third-Party frameworks or libraries are Required. All we need is a static web server like NGINX. This project was started in 2011 and moved to OpenSpeedTest.com dedicated Project/Domain Name in 2013.

For better results choose expose ports option and access speedtest on cosmos-ip:3333 (or the port you provided).
description: HTML5 Internet Speed Test. no Flash or Java!
